casebody.data:
Nellie MELTON
v.
FAMILY FIRST MORTGAGE. No. 164A03. Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 15, 2003. S. Mark Rabil, Winston-Salem, for Nellie Melton. Richard Keshian, Winston-Salem, for Flagstar Bank and Union Planters.

Motion by Defendant for Extension of Time to File Brief has been filed and the following order entered:

"Motion Allowed. Defendant (Family First Mortgage Corp.) shall have up to and including the 7th day of July 2003 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 15th day of May 2003."
